distributions.header: Pick the Boilerplate for Your Project

custom.text: Create a custom boilerplate by installing the Evolution Tool Box. Follow the instructions on the installation page.

sass.text: This boilerplate is built using Sass, and you can work with it in the same way. Download the ZIP and start developing.

css.text: Grab this version of the boilerplate if you want everything in vanilla CSS and JS. Download the ZIP and start developing.
